name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Storage
Bucket
List
description: Bucket::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Storage
Bucket
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more buckets that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Storage::Project#buckets to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Storage
Bucket
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more buckets that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Storage::Project#buckets to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Storage
Bucket
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of buckets.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

buckets = storage.buckets
if buckets.next?
  next_buckets = buckets.next
end

require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

buckets = storage.buckets
if buckets.next?
  next_buckets = buckets.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Storage
Bucket
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all buckets by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each bucket, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all buckets are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each bucket by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

buckets = storage.buckets
buckets.all do |bucket|
  puts bucket.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

buckets = storage.buckets
all_names = buckets.all.map do |bucket|
  bucket.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

buckets = storage.buckets
buckets.all(request_limit: 10) do |bucket|
  puts bucket.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all buckets. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each bucket.
